snippet.title: Q.U.B.E: Director's Cut - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
*Available on PC, PS3, PS4, XBOX ONE & Wii U NOW!*

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/239430/

http://www.qubegame.com/

Q.U.B.E: Director's Cut is the definitive version of the brain-twisting first-person puzzler. Using special high-tech gloves to manipulate cubes in the environment, the player solves an array of conundrums - from physics-based challenges; to 3D jigsaws; to platform-based trials.


Toxic Games is an award-winning, independent game development studio based in the U.K. which specialises in brain-twisting, first-person puzzle games.

Follow us on social media for all the latest updates!
www.twitter.com/qubegame
www.facebook.com/qubegame
www.instagram.com/toxicgamesstudio

Official Website: www.toxicgames.co.uk
